explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a yellow knife chopping dark chocolate on a cutting board. The knife features a cute duck pattern. Chocolate crumbs are scattered on the cutting board and the white table. There are green plants in the background.

[0-4] The yellow knife slowly chops the chocolate piece by piece. The scene changes to a pair of milky white, furry cat paws pressing on the back of the knife, slowly moving forward to chop the chocolate.

[0-4] The yellow knife slowly chops the chocolate piece by piece. The scene changes to a pair of milky white, furry cat paws pressing on the back of the knife, slowly moving forward to chop the chocolate.

[4-6] Next, the cat paws pour the chopped chocolate into a chocolate melting pot using a transparent container. Then, a stick is used to slowly stir the melted chocolate sauce clockwise.
[4-6] Next, the cat paws pour the chopped chocolate into a chocolate melting pot using a transparent container. Then, a stick is used to slowly stir the melted chocolate sauce clockwise.

[6-10] Subsequently, the cat paws use a small transparent spoon to pour the melted chocolate sauce into white square molds from left to right. Then, the white mold is tilted, allowing the chocolate sauce to slowly flow from top to bottom, filling the remaining empty squares.

[10-14] The cat paws then use a transparent spoon to add matcha-colored ice cream powder to a green-rimmed bowl. The bowl is white with green dinosaurs and lollipops painted on it. The orange caption "ice cream powder" appears in the video. Then, a transparent cup is used to pour milk into the bowl, submerging the ice cream powder. The orange caption "milk" appears in the video. Afterward, a whisk is used to mix the milk and ice cream powder mixture.

[23-29] The solidified chocolate blocks are cut in half with a silver knife. Then, the tip of the knife is used to slowly push open the left half, revealing the strawberry and ice cream inside the chocolate block. Finally, the cat paws use small tongs to arrange the cut chocolate blocks on a small white table, forming a pyramid shape. The scene changes to a small gray cat with a purple tie around its neck. The tie features a yellow skull pattern. The kitten lies on its front paws on the white table, on which there is a small table with chocolate blocks and a sign that reads "料理猫王" (Chef Cat King). The orange caption "meow~" appears on the right side of the video.
